Download Delta

Windows

Download Windows Installer

1. Download and run the installer

2. Follow the on-screen instructions

3. Open Command Prompt and type 'delta' to start

macOS

Download macOS Installer

1. Download the installer script

2. Open Terminal and run:

chmod +x install-macos.sh
./install-macos.sh

3. Open Terminal and type 'delta' to start

Linux

Download Linux Installer

1. Download the installer script

2. Open Terminal and run:

chmod +x install-linux.sh
./install-linux.sh

3. Open Terminal and type 'delta' to start

System Requirements

  • 4GB RAM minimum (8GB recommended)
  • 10GB free disk space
  • Internet connection for initial setup
  • Windows 10/11, macOS 10.15+, or Ubuntu 20.04+

Note

The first run will download the default AI model (deepseek-r1:1.5b). This may take a few minutes depending on your internet connection.
